name: MEC Cozy Hoodie - Children
categories: Toddler and child fleece, hoodies and Sweaters
description:
A long, warm hoodie that keeps weight low and comfort high. The Cozy hood is just that, cozy. Made from a lightweight fleece this hoodie is great over a tee on the playground or layered under a shell on a chilly hike.Crafted from a brushed polyester fleece that holds in warmth and wicks away moisture.Dropped hemline provides more coverage and leaves room to grow.Raglan sleeves keep movement free and work well will pack straps.Large, soft hood ups the comfort factor.Name tag on the inside, great for making play date or daycare pick-ups a little easier.

        Sustainability
